ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // “Hey, you feelin' all better now?
That's good, real good.”{PAUSE}“Now don't overdo yourself
like that again, hear?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // “Isn't the Lifestream
a strange thing?”{PAUSE}“When I die,
I wonder if I'll float along
in the middle of a warm gentle
stream like this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // “Hmph! You!?
How did you get over your Mako poisoning?”{PAUSE}“It's absolutely amazing…
I am so glad for you!
Looks like your friends' wishes came true.”{PAUSE}“You can see for yourself what things are like,
but at least no one was seriously hurt.
We're just very unhappy now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “Welcome!
We always welcome cash!
What can I do for you today?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “I'm sorry.
Our stock isn't so great now…
But that's just the way it is here.”{PAUSE}“If you're looking for other items,
why don't you check out
the other stores?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “Welcome.
Just what you need at a time like
this--a shop of rest and relaxation.
What ya want?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “Thank you!
We don't have many goods
but you come again, please.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:34}); // “Oh great.
Now I've got to find another job…”{PAUSE}“I guess I might as well make my
side job as an accessory seller
into my regular job.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:35}); // “Well, since you're already here,
why don't you buy something
to take back with you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // “Thank you.
Stop by again.”
addPaletteColors_0xe9({sourcePaletteId:0, targetPaletteId:4, r:41, g:Bank[5][41], b:Bank[5][41], size:15});

dialogStrings: Mideel

“Ahoy! This here's Mideel.
As you can see,
this used to be a quiet hot springs town.”{PAUSE}“Everything's gone now but
in a way, I'm kinda glad
everything's cleaned out.
Feels better this way, ho, ho.”

“Have you seen my husband?
He disappeared during the big
earthquake and I haven't seen him since.”{PAUSE}“I thought he'd be in the store…”{PAUSE}“You don't think he got through that door
and went to another country
on the other side, do you?”{PAUSE}“That's all just a dream…
That could never really happen.
Heh…”

“Welcome!
We always welcome cash!
What can I do for you today?”

“I'm sorry.
Our stock isn't so great now…
But that's just the way it is here.”{PAUSE}“If you're looking for other items,
why don't you check out
the other stores?”

“Welcome.
Just what you need at a time like
this--a shop of rest and relaxation.
What ya want?”

“Thank you!
We don't have many goods
but you come again, please.”

“Hee, hee. Welcome
It's here. The day's finally come!
Your day to shop!!”

“Do we have items and weapons!?
Well, I should say so. And here's a bargain!
What would you say to 50% off everything?”{PAUSE}“Just kidding. Even I wouldn't do
something like that.
Now what can I do for you today?”

{CHOICE}Show me your items
{CHOICE}Show me some weapons
{CHOICE}Show me some Materia
{CHOICE}Let me outta here

“Thank you.
Come again!”

“Hey, you feelin' all better now?
That's good, real good.”{PAUSE}“Now don't overdo yourself
like that again, hear?”

“Isn't the Lifestream
a strange thing?”{PAUSE}“When I die,
I wonder if I'll float along
in the middle of a warm gentle
stream like this?”

“Hmph! You!?
How did you get over your Mako poisoning?”{PAUSE}“It's absolutely amazing…
I am so glad for you!
Looks like your friends' wishes came true.”{PAUSE}“You can see for yourself what things are like,
but at least no one was seriously hurt.
We're just very unhappy now.”

“You probably don't remember, but
you know that girl that watched over
you for so long when you were sick?”{PAUSE}“You'd better be good to her.
If you don't, you'll be sorry.
Believe me!”

{Cloud}
“Who's this?
Say, why are you being so friendly?”{PAUSE}“Oh, so this is it?
You like the Mimmet Greens, don't you?”

{CHOICE}Give it some Mimmet Greens
{CHOICE}Don't give it any!

{Cloud}
“Sorry, peewee
But I can't give you any.”

{Cloud}
“Well, I guess it won't hurt.
Here, shorty, eat up.”

{Cloud}
“Ha, ha. You're pretty cute.
Here, I'm gonna tickle you a bit.”
The Chocobo devoured the Greens.

{CHOICE}Tickle the bottom of its feet
{CHOICE}Tickle its stomach
{CHOICE}Tickle its neck
{CHOICE}Tickle its belly button
{CHOICE}Tickle behind its ear
{CHOICE}Tickle under its arm
The Chocobo looks happy.
The Chocobo looks ticklish.
The Chocobo looks angry.
The Chocobo looks shy.
The Chocobo looks bored.
Dined and dashed.
Received Materia from the Chocobo!

But you have too much Materia already.
You can't take on anymore…
The Chocobo put the Materia away.

{Cloud}
“Hey, don't surprise me like that!
I thought you were dead!”

“Well anyhow…
Hey, you all look terrible.
Why don't you rest up for a while?”

“OK! Perfect!
Well then, take care.”

“Oh great.
Now I've got to find another job…”{PAUSE}“I guess I might as well make my
side job as an accessory seller
into my regular job.”

“Well, since you're already here,
why don't you buy something
to take back with you?”

“Thank you.
Stop by again.”

Chocobos ignore humans who
don't look like they'll give them greens.
